name: Export Firestore documents to Google Sheets
description:
This Template helps you export a collection of Firestore documents to Google Sheets. Make will automatically save all document field values in a new spreadsheet row. This scenario uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dqne2-XTefy6Z1GiEbFVaiGhN_V74qcFuTDrY5Kty3k/edit?usp=sharing).
Prerequisite: This template can't save fields of Array, Map or Geo type.
